en.title: Building Maintenance Management System | PraticOS
en.description: Centralize maintenance requests by unit! Work order system for builders, property managers and facilities with apartment history, warranty tracking and resident tracking link. Get organized in 5 minutes.
en.keywords: building maintenance software, property maintenance management, facility maintenance system, building work order app, apartment maintenance software, property management maintenance
en.ogDescription: Centralize requests by unit! WO system with apartment history, warranty tracking and resident tracking link. Get organized in 5 minutes.

hero.title: Complete maintenance management
hero.subtitle: Stop losing requests on WhatsApp. Complete history by apartment, warranty deadline tracking and a tracking link for residents and managers. For builders, property managers and maintenance companies.

problems.title: Do you face
problems.subtitle: Common pain points for building maintenance teams

items.title: Requests lost on WhatsApp
items.text: Resident sends a photo on WhatsApp and the request gets lost in the chat. No formal record, no traceability.

items.title: No history by unit
items.text: Don't know what was done in apartment 101, building A. Technician arrives with no information and wastes time.

items.title: Warranty deadlines out of control
items.text: Don't know when waterproofing or structural warranty expires. Risk of servicing out of warranty or missing legal obligations.

items.title: No proof of repair
items.text: No documented before/after photos. Resident disputes, builder can't prove the service was done.

items.title: Coordinating multiple contractors
items.text: 3 to 5 different contractors per building. No visibility on who did what and when.

items.title: Resident asks for updates daily
items.text: Resident calls and texts asking 'what about my request?'. Manager demands status and has nowhere to check.

solutions.title: How
solutions.subtitle: Features designed for building maintenance operations

items.title: Requests centralized by unit
items.text: Each apartment, garage or commercial unit has its own file with complete history.

items.title: Complete unit history
items.text: Search by unit and see everything: previous requests, photos, materials used, responsible parties.

items.title: Warranty and deadline alerts
items.text: Get notifications before warranties expire and preventive maintenance deadlines approach.

items.title: Geolocated before/after photos
items.text: Prove each repair with photos that have date, time and GPS location.

items.title: Multi-team scheduling
items.text: Assign requests to different technicians and contractors. Each sees their schedule on their phone.

items.title: Tracking link
items.text: Resident and manager track request status on their phone. No calls, no WhatsApp.

checklist.title: Unit maintenance
checklist.text: Digital checklist to identify the unit, document the issue and record the solution. Technician fills on phone, resident signs digitally.

items.text: Unit identification (building/tower/apt)
Issue reported by resident
Affected system (plumbing, electrical, etc.)
Before and after repair photos
Materials used
Resident or caretaker signature

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: Powerful and intuitive tools for builders, property managers and facilities

items.title: Digital WO
items.text: Create complete work orders with unit identification, photos, history and values. All organized.

items.title: Geolocated Photos
items.text: Photograph the service with date, time and GPS location. Irrefutable proof of the repair.

items.title: PDF Reports
items.text: Generate maintenance reports by unit or by building. Ready to send to the manager or board.

items.title: Warranty Tracking
items.text: Track warranty deadlines by system and by development. Automatic alerts.

items.title: Multi-Building Management
items.text: Manage multiple buildings or developments in one place. Consolidated view.

items.title: Tracking Link
items.text: Resident and manager track request status on their phone. Total transparency.

testimonial.quote: Before we lost requests on WhatsApp and residents complained nothing was resolved. With PraticOS, each unit has its history and residents track via the link. Satisfaction improved enormously.
testimonial.name: Fernanda Oliveira
testimonial.role: Technical assistance manager at a construction company

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered before you start

items.question: Do I need to pay to use it?
items.answer: No! The free plan is real and has no time limit. You can use it forever with up to 30 photos/month. Our pricing is transparent and you don't need to talk to a salesperson.

items.question: Does it work for builders, property managers or maintenance companies?
items.answer: Yes! PraticOS adapts to any company that does building maintenance. You identify each unit (apartment, garage, office) and keep the complete history.

items.question: Can residents track their request?
items.answer: Yes! You can send a tracking link to the resident or manager. They see the updated status on their phone, without calling or texting.

items.question: Will my technicians be able to use it?
items.answer: Absolutely! PraticOS was made to be as simple as using WhatsApp. If you know how to use a phone, you know how to use PraticOS.

items.question: What if I need help?
items.answer: We have email support and complete documentation. We respond within 24 business hours. Our team knows the daily routine of building maintenance.

download.title: Download now and
download.text: Available for iOS and Android. Start free!

contact.title: Need
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you
